main event: A civilian witnessed a single bright object maneuvering and hovering in the sky for about 15 minutes in the Indiana-Illinois area on 5/10/57.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes, indicating a sustained and prolonged sighting.
The details of the object were not sufficient to determine its identity, leading to an unknown conclusion.
The object was brightly lighted in amber and white colors, parallel to the course east of Illinois for 3-4 minutes before disappearing and then reappearing for about 1 minute.
The object was observed to turn green before vanishing, suggesting a change in appearance.
The report was addressed to various authorities including the Director of Intelligence and the Commander of the Military Flight Service.
sighted object: single bright object maneuvering and hovering in the sky
